xwikidoc.title: Mocca Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content:
#general MoccaCalendar.calendar=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.title=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.defaultCalendarTitle=Other Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewall=Overview of all calendars MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewSubscribed=Subscribed calendars MoccaCalendar.calendar.create=Create new calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.subscribe=Subscribe to a calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist=agenda MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titlepast=Past Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titleupcoming=Upcoming Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.nopastevents=No past events found. MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.noupcomingevents=No upcoming events found. MoccaCalendar.calendar.firstDayOfWeek=0 MoccaCalendar.calendar.readonly=This is a read only calendar and you can not create events for it. MoccaCalendar.calendar.noevent=This page does not contain an event.
MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.viewall=All events MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.create=Create new event MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.import=Import .ics file MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.import.title=Import the events from a calendar using an .ics file MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.backlink=Back to calendar «{0}» MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.confirmDelete=Do you really want to delete the event {0}Â ? MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.view=Event MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.confirmDelete.allEventsButton=All Instances MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.color.defaultValue=Calendar Default MoccaCalendar.generic.errormessage=Internal Server Error
# Import ical file MoccaCalendar.import.modal.title=Import calendar MoccaCalendar.import.modal.file.label=.ics file to be imported MoccaCalendar.import.modal.button.start=Begin import MoccaCalendar.import.generated.description.attendee=Attendee: {0} MoccaCalendar.import.generated.description.location=Location: {0} MoccaCalendar.import.generated.description.organizer=Organizer: {0}
# Notifications MoccaCalendar.notification.import.inprogress=Calendar file import in progress... MoccaCalendar.notification.import.done=Calendar successfully imported! MoccaCalendar.notification.import.error=There was an error while importing the calendar data. Please try again or consult the logs! MoccaCalendar.notification.import.filetoolarge=The file size is too large MoccaCalendar.notification.addObject.error=An error occurred while trying to add the class object.
# Class fields MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_title=Title MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_color=Background color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_textColor=Text color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_description=Description MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_content1=Content MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass.textColor.unset=(white)
# Subscribe class fields MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_title=Title MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_color=Background color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_textColor=Text color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_description=Description MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_content1=Content MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_iCal=The iCal of the calendar MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_gCal=The gCal of the calendar MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_gApiKey=Google API key MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarSubscribeClass_globalDisplay=Display the events inside the global calendar
# Subscribed event localization moccacalendar.subscribedevent.allday.yes=Yes moccacalendar.subscribedevent.allday.no=No
# Live table generic keys moccacalendar.livetable.doc.title=Calendar moccacalendar.livetable.doc.subscribed=Subscribed calendar moccacalendar.livetable.doc.name=Page name moccacalendar.livetable.doc.space=Space moccacalendar.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name moccacalendar.livetable.doc.author=Last Author moccacalendar.livetable.doc.creator=Creator moccacalendar.livetable.doc.date=Update date moccacalendar.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date moccacalendar.livetable._avatar=Avatar moccacalendar.livetable._images=Images moccacalendar.livetable._attachments=Attachments moccacalendar.livetable._actions=Actions moccacalendar.livetable._actions.edit=Edit moccacalendar.livetable._actions.delete=Delete moccacalendar.livetable.emptyvalue=- moccacalendar.livetable.title=Title moccacalendar.livetable.description=Description moccacalendar.livetable.content1=Content
moccacalendar.extension.name=Calendar Application (Pro)
# Mocca Calendar Events keys # Class fields MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_title=Title MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_startDate=Start date MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_endDate=End date MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_description=Description MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_backgroundColor=Background color MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_textColor=Text color MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_allDay=All day MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_recurrent=Recurrent
# Calendar Source Configuration Class fields MoccaCalendar.Code.DefaultEventSourceConfigClass.source={0} as Events MoccaCalendar.Code.DefaultEventSourceConfigClass_active=Active MoccaCalendar.Code.DefaultEventSourceConfigClass_active.hint=If active, events from this source will be shown in this calendar.
MoccaCalendar.Code.MeetingsSourceConfigClass.source=Meetings as Events MoccaCalendar.Code.MeetingsSourceConfigClass_active=Active MoccaCalendar.Code.MeetingsSourceConfigClass_active.hint=If active, meetings will be shown in this calendar. MoccaCalendar.Code.MeetingsSourceConfigClass_meetings=Meetings location MoccaCalendar.Code.MeetingsSourceConfigClass_meetings.hint=The location from which meetings are shown.
# modification class fields MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency=Frequency MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_daily=daily MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_workdays=workdays MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_weekly=weekly MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_biweekly=biweekly MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_monthly=monthly MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_quarterly=quarterly MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_frequency_yearly=yearly MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_firstInstance=First occurrence of the event MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventRecurrencyClass_lastInstance=Last occurrence of the event MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_title=Modified title MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_startDate=Modified start date MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_endDate=Modified end date MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_description=Modified description MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_backgroundColor=Modified background color MoccaCalendar.Code.MoccaCalendarEventModificationClass_textColor=Modified text color
# the modification switch moccacalendarevent.editswitch.label=Edit: moccacalendarevent.editswitch.oneInstance=this instance only moccacalendarevent.editswitch.allInstances=all instances
# Event live table generic keys (currently unused) moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.title=Page title moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.name=Page name moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.space=Space moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.author=Last Author moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.creator=Creator moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.date=Update date moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date moccacalendarevent.livetable._avatar=Avatar moccacalendarevent.livetable._images=Images moccacalendarevent.livetable._attachments=Attachments moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions=Action moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions.edit=Edit moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions.delete=Delete moccacalendarevent.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys moccacalendarevent.livetable.title=Title moccacalendarevent.livetable.startDate=Start date moccacalendarevent.livetable.endDate=End date moccacalendarevent.livetable.description=Description
# validation messages: on save val_title_notvalid=Title field contains invalid characters. val_title_notempty=Title field is required. val_startDateMissing=A start date is missing for the event. val_startDateNotDate=The given start date cannot be read as a date. val_endDateNotDate=The given end date cannot be read as a date. val_endDate=End date must be after start date. val_title_already_exists=An event with this name already exists. moccacalendar.updates.firstInstance.notDate=The given first instance date cannot be read as a date. moccacalendar.updates.lastInstance.notDate=The given last instance date cannot be read as a date.
# validation messages: Update Service moccacalendar.updates.eventUpdated=Updated event time. moccacalendar.updates.eventrecurrent=Recurrent events cannot be moved. moccacalendar.updates.valuesinvalid=The new event time is invalid. moccacalendar.updates.nodocument=The event is no longer available.
# validation messages: Delete Service moccacalendar.delete.startDateInvalid=The event start date could not be read. moccacalendar.delete.saveMessage=Event instance at {0} deleted.
# validation messages: Modification Service moccacalendar.modify.createMessage=Added modification for one event instance. moccacalendar.modify.saveMessage=Updated modification for one event instance.
# Template provider templateProvider.calendar.name=Calendar templateProvider.calendar.description=Add a new calendar
## event sheets moccacalendar.sheets.generic.noevent=This page cannot be displayed in the calendar. {0}View it{1} as wiki page instead. moccacalendar.sources.config.label=Configure events from source \u00AB{0}\u00BB
## Calendar macro rendering.macro.moccacalendar.addObject.description=This action will transform the current calendar macro in a dedicated Calendar page. This will allow further customizations of color schemes and you will find it in the Calendar overview. Note that any other content on this page will be added in the calendar description. The action is irreversible! rendering.macro.moccacalendar.addObject.button=Add calendar class rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Mocca Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Displays a Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Show events from ... rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Calendar page rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList' rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Saturday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gCal.name=gCal rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gCal.description=Google calendar IDs separated by commas. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApiKey rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Key for the Google Calendar API. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.iCal.name=iCal rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.iCal.description=The iCalendar URL.
xwiki.calendar.button.plainList=Agenda
# Upcoming events macro rendering.macro.moccacalendar.upcomingEvents.name=Mocca Calendar Upcoming Events rendering.macro.moccacalendar.upcomingEvents.description=Displays upcoming calendar events rendering.macro.moccacalendar.upcomingEvents.parameter.limit.name=limit rendering.macro.moccacalendar.upcomingEvents.parameter.limit.description=The maximum number of events to list.
# Upcoming events panel moccacalendar.panel.upcomingEvents.header=Upcoming Events
# admin section admin.moccacalendar.sources.section=Calendar admin.moccacalendar.sources.header=Enable Calendar Event Sources admin.moccacalendar.sources.empty=There are no calendar event sources to configure. admin.moccacalendar.sources.active.label=Show events from source \u00AB{0}\u00BB:
